title: Return earth
fullText:
The earthing conductor(s) that connects an EP junction to the installation earth at the main earthing conductor at the main switchboard, or to the submain earthing conductor(s) at the switchboard(s) from which supply is made available.
NOTE: This Standard does not include requirements for the size of the conductor used for return earths, which should therefore be in accordance with the requirements of AS/NZS 3000.
